item.title: SRL Stringer
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Heres my second script, I have been too lazy to fix it up. It gets the job done, not the best it could be of course. thats why i’m posting in this section. I released it on srl a long ass time ago, the banking was having a little trouble. can anyone tell me if it still tries to bank twice

any suggestions will be greatly appreciated

edit** i’ll just post it here because most of you are too lazy to look.
changed the script to my more modern version with support for SRL 2 and errors fixed

{-------------------------------------------------]
|     Weaselforce's ubtastic BowStringer          |
|                                                 |
| Only my second script, i'm not teh 1337 yet     |
|                                                 |
| Big thanks to SRL community for getting me      |
|excited in scar scripting and for all their help |
[_________________________________________________]
|                                                 |
| Based Heavily on "pdStringer" by philodespotos. |
|                    MUCH <3                      |
|                                                 |
|                  DIRECTIONS:                    |
|Fill in the amount to do, sit back, and relax    |
|Only my second script, i'd greatly appreciate any|
|suggestions or revisions. strings and bows (u)   |
|in slots 1 and 2.                                |
|                                                 |
|             changelog : Version Beta            |
|     made the script, tested it, made it work    |
|                                                 |
|                         Veresion 1:             |
|     Fixed stupid mistake, standards fixed       |
| somewhat, made lots of improvements             |
|                                                 |
|                          Version 1.1            |
|     Fixed bank withdraw errors and such,        |
| Upgraded for SRL 2.0                            |
|                                                 |
|               Current Version: 1.1              |
[_________________________________________________}



program WeaselStringer;

{.include SRL/SRL.scar}

//-----------------------------------------------------//

Const
AmountToDo = 2; // Amount of bows to make.

//-----------------------------------------------------//



var
amount,amountleft,amountdone:integer;


Procedure BankingWithdraw;
begin
     if(not (inventorycount=0))then
 begin
  OpenBank3;
  DepositAll;
  BankingWithdraw;
  end else
     begin
     if (not (Bankscreen))
     then
     begin
     OpenBank3;
     Fixbank;
       end else
      Fixbank;
      if (amountleft > 14)then
      begin
      Amount := 14;
      Withdraw(1,1,14);
      Withdraw(2,1,0);
      CloseWindow;
      Wait(random(350)+150);
      DragItem(1,28);
        end  else
         begin
          Amount := AmountLeft
          Withdraw(2,1,1);
          Withdraw(1,1,1);
          wait(100+random(100));
          Withdraw(2,1,(amount-1));
          Withdraw(1,1,(amount-1));
          Closewindow;
          Wait(random(350)+100);
          wait(100 + random(50));
          DragItem(1,28)
          wait(500+random(100));
          DragItem(2,27)
    end;
   end;
 end;


Procedure Stringin;
var Strung : integer;
begin
 MouseSpeed := 12
 Strung := 0
 repeat
 begin
   UseItem(27);
   Wait(300+random(150));
   UseItem(28);
   Wait(300+random(150));
   Strung := Strung + 1
   UseItem(28);
   Wait(300+random(150));
   UseItem(27);
   Strung := Strung + 1
   Wait(300+random(150));
   end;
 until(Strung = Amount);
 amountleft := amountleft -(Amount)
 amountdone := amountdone +(Amount)
 MouseSpeed := 12
 wait(400+random(100));
end;

procedure BankingDeposit;
begin
  if (ExistsItem(14)) then
  begin
  OpenBank3;
  fixbank;
  Wait(200+random(50));
  Deposit2(1,0);
  end else
     OpenBank3;
     fixbank;
     Wait(200+random(50));
     DepositAll;
     wait(375 + random(30));
end;

procedure RandomEvents;
Begin
FindSandwich;
FindTalk;
FindLamp('fletching');
GambleNewBox;
FindNormalRandoms;
end;

begin
  SetupSRL;
  MouseSpeed := 12
  BenMouse := True
  CloseWindow;
  ChatsOff;
 amountleft := amounttodo
 AmountDone := 0
  RandomEvents;
 repeat
   Amount := 0
   ChatsOff;
   BankingWithdraw;
   Closewindow;
   RandomEvents;
   Stringin;
   RandomEvents;
   BankingDeposit;
 until(AmountDone=AmountToDo);
  BankingDeposit;
  SetChat('on',1)
  TypeSend('Im Teh awesome! done stringin!'+chr(13));
  writeln('finished Stringin all the bows')
  writeln('Loggin out')
  logout;
end.

Read full topic
